channel.title: My Highscores is not saving the players to it
channel.description:
Ok... so I've basically done everything correct with my highscores so far... I have everything working... except server side. My highscores shows up on the internet, but no player's names are on it.. When I compile the server I have 0 errors... but when I run it, this shows up at the top.....
[00:00:00]: [00:00:00]: Loading... [00:00:01]: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.MySQLSyntaxErrorException: Unknown database 'highscores/' [00:00:01]: at com.mysql.jdbc.SQLError.createSQLException(SQLError.java:936) [00:00:01]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java:2941) [00:00:01]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.checkErrorPacket(MysqlIO.java:868) [00:00:01]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.secureAuth411(MysqlIO.java:3340) [00:00:01]: at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.doHandshake(MysqlIO.java:1238) [00:00:01]: at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2743) [00:00:01]: at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1553) [00:00:01]: at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java:266) [00:00:01]: at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) [00:00:01]: at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(Unknown Source) [00:00:01]: at server.Server.createConnection(Server.java:128) [00:00:01]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:179)

item.title: My Highscores is not saving the players to it
item.dc:creator: @AuDiOdreams AuDiOdreams
item.description:
@AuDiOdreams wrote:

At the bottom of my Adminphp page it says…

Connection for controluser as defined in your configuration failed.
